articles.author: Steven Levy
articles.title: Tim Cook Wants Apple to Literally Save Your Life - WIRED
articles.description: Much as the CEO seems awestruck by AI and his just-released Apple Intelligence, he’s more convinced that the tech giant’s health apps will define the company’s legacy.
articles.content: Every time I visit the Apple Park campus, my mind flashes to a tour I took months before construction was finished, when there was dust on the terrazzo floors and mud where lush vegetation now flouri… [+4125 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Intel’s second-generation Arc B580 GPU beats Nvidia’s RTX 4060 for $249 - Ars Technica
articles.description: Intel’s dedicated GPUs are back for another round, and they’re aiming for 1440p.
